description: Audit workflow to scan all project coderef folders, index plan.json files, extract status/progress, and surface stale or active plans. Uses Scriptboard file indexer for discovery.

workflow.description: Orchestrator-initiated audit of all plan.json across projects
steps: 2. Scriptboard file indexer scans all registered project coderef folders
3. Indexes all plan.json files with metadata extraction
4. Extracts: feature_name, status, current_phase, tasks_completed, last_updated
6. Surfaces: stale plans, blocked plans, active plans, completion rates
7. Orchestrator reviews and takes action (follow up, archive, close)

scriptboard_file_indexer.role: Discovery and indexing of plan.json files

orchestrator.role: Triggers audit, reviews results, takes action

queries: What plans are stale (no update > 7 days)?
What's the completion rate per project?
Which projects have the most active work?
